author: khorgath
msg: HIVE-4419 : webhcat - support ${WEBHCAT_PREFIX}/conf/ as config directory (Thejas M Nair via Sushanth Sowmyan)

author: tabish
msg: Adds a new TimerEx class that implements a more scalable and controllable Timer object than the basic .NET version.  Can be used to schedule multiple tasks that are run from a single Thread.  Individual tasks can be cancelled as needed and tasks can be scheduled to repeat using either fixed rate or fixed delay execution.

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-4952: add method to force DrillSideways to keep all sub-scorers on the doc being collected
